input.sentences: we are in a fall parade today .
papa smurf is the mascot in the back of our pick up truck .
papa smurf dwarfs the festival audience .
both young and old are delighted to be part of the festivities .
the event concludes with the start on a warm bonfire .
output.sentences: Today we celebrate the youth of our community.
The children loved the attention from Papa Smurf.
Families from all over had a great time.
We were even able to continue the event into the evening.
